snippet.title: Empire of the Ants (2000) | Trailer [GOG]
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉https://bit.ly/3UE7E4g

An extremely unique RTS and simulation title originally released on PC in 2000. Based on the bestseller book of the same name by Bernard Werber and created by Microids, Empire of the Ants (2000) offers one of a kind experience of becoming the leader of an ant colony, who must feed its workers, expand it, and protect the queen at all costs.

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
